entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
